nodes.text: The Trymant system was a star system that contained the planet Trymant IV and several moons, including Korbatal. The system was affected in the Great Hyperspace Disaster, which left Korbatal and several other moons destroyed.

Created for the Star Wars: The High Republic publishing initiative, the Trymant system was first mentioned in the short story "STET!," written by Daniel José Older and published in the collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back in 2020. It later appeared in the comic The High Republic Adventures 1, written by Older, illustrated by Harvey Tolibao, and published by IDW Publishing on February 3, 2021.

In a preview of The High Republic Adventures 1 released in The High Republic Free Digital Sampler, the system was on one instance mentioned by the name "Trymantian system," but the final comic adjusted the mention to use "Trymant."
